column1: Local Foods////Had a fabulous dinner at the new Kirby location on Saturday night - local
column2: free-range chicken with VEGAN mashed potatoes and grilled squash. Since I have a dairy allergy
column3: I was thrilled about the vegan option for the mashed potatoes
column4: so thank you! My dinner also came with a complimentary appetizer of sliced tomatoes with basil
column7: balsamic and oil. So delish! I just wish y'all would come to Clear Lake!
